name: Candlelight Cafe
description:
Brought to you by The Catfeteria Ladies, is a cozy dark-academia inspired interactive environment coffee shop.

It’s been a rough day at work and all you want to do is go home and take a nap. But on the way home you notice a new shop-or is it? A note is fixed to the door:

Dearest Wandering Customer,

Please enter. Read of the worlds beyond yours and the greatest minds throughout all of time. My collection is free to discover. My food and drink, yours to enjoy.

Sincerely,

Gregory Stephan

*******

P.s. Don’t mind Sebastian, he minds the place.

Perhaps there is more to this place than meets the eye?

Read through the books and observe the environment. You’ll find history, fantasy, and poetry of all sorts. Maybe you’ll find something more to the mysterious cafe. . Look long enough and maybe you’ll even find more about yourself.
